name: Mad Marble Mayhem Demo
description:
Welcome to Mad Marble Mayhem! Play through puzzles and mazes, as you collect coins and race against the clock. Are you marble-lous enough to beat the maze? Play through thirteen levels of Mad Marble Mayhem today!

Mad Marble Mayhem is a tilt controlled game built for IOS in Unity. 13 levels currently completed, with more planned for the future.  

The first level shows the basics, the next 3 introduce moving walls and platforms, as well as the red area. Levels 5, 6, and 7 show off platforms that the shoot the player across the level. Levels 8, 9, and 10 help the player adjust to jumping and feature different camera angles. The last three levels introduce teleporting via two devices.
